Good and nostalgic game, yet needs quite skills to enjoy the game. Practice is needed to master aiming, hearing footsteps, and knowing regular hiding places and tactics. if you're not a skilled player you can play deathmatches or gun races to practice. It is not advised to play competitive until you are certain about your skills.
All and All, it's probably the most famous multiplayer shooting game in middle east. It's a culture!
Don't do it, and if you do, be prepared to be angry most of the time. That said, I look forward to another 2000 hours ...
